DIA_Beggar_11277_EXIT_03_02: But it's only ten gold pieces! Please help me!
DIA_Beggar_11277_DA_BeggarsStart_03_02: Ten gold pieces, I'm not asking for anything more!
DIA_Beggar_11277_After10Gold_03_01: Others should find out what a good heart you have, too!
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DA2_03_03: You were so nice to me...
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DA2_03_04: I thought you could help my friends too.
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DA2_03_05: We only want ten gold pieces per head!
DIA_Beggar_11277_DA2_After_03_02: Haha, we need to visit you more often.
DIA_Beggar_11277_DA2_After_03_04: You'd better have gold with you next time, or you'll regret it!
DIA_Beggar_11277_DA2_After_03_06: I'm counting on you to raise money by our next meeting!
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DA3_15_02: What? I can't financially support everyone you bring in!
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DA3_03_03: I don't think you have a choice.
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DA3_03_04: Your good heart is beating so loudly that everyone has already heard it!
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DA3_03_05: But, interestingly, it can stop beating at any time.
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_DontGive_15_01: I can't give you all my money.
DIA_Beggar_11277_Trap_GiveMoney_15_01: We have to help each other.
